Uses of Package
org.apache.sis.gui.coverage

Packages that use org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
Widgets showing GridCoverage images or sample values.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.gui.coverage used by org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
    Class
    Description
    CoverageCanvas
    A canvas for RenderedImage provided by a GridCoverage or a GridCoverageResource.
    CoverageExplorer
    An image or tabular view of GridCoverage together with controls for band selection and other operations.
    CoverageExplorer.View
    Type of view shown in the explorer.
    GridView
    A view of numerical values in a RenderedImage.
    ImageRequest
    A request for a two-dimensional view of a grid coverage.
